overview: HEALING PROCESS depicts the emotional state I was in the year following the death of my father. The images used include footage of my father as a young man, footage of him in the hospital and footage of a figure under a white sheet representing someone prepared to be wheeled off to an operating room. The sound track is the song "Au Clair de la Lune" sung in a duet. The effects is the mixture of emotions one goes through when losing someone very close. â€“ L. K.
title: Healing Process
